title: San Francisco/Fisherman's Wharf
name: Maritime Museum
directions: located in Aquatic Park at the western end of Fisherman's Wharf
content: Shaped like a ship, this historic building was originally built by the WPA as a bathhouse and served as the Maritime Museum for many years before a recent renovation. The maritime exhibits have been moved to storage and the Visitor Center, but you can enter and view the beautiful underwater-themed murals.
